Naples hostels

It takes just a couple of minutes to book a Naples hostel. Find 40 Naples hostels, reviewed by 1080 backpackers who have actually reserved them with us. To check availability now, fill in the form on the left of the page and click "search". You can also browse the city map, or directly access the booking form for each property by using its 'book' button.

Naples Membership Card deals

In this list you'll find a choice of exclusive discounts in Naples for all HostelsClub Membership Card holders.

Click here to see them all »

Ostello Bella Napoli

Category: Hostel

Address: Via G. Melisurgo 4 (7th Floor, Stair B, Door 25) - Naples, Italy

Starting from: 15.00 EUR

(indicative price per person, per night)

10% discount for HostelsClub.com Membership Card holders (2 nights minimum)
10% discount for 10 or more guests

Bella Napoli is a youth hostel ideally located between "Università" and "Municipio" metro stops. An amazing place to stay where you'll find both private and shared rooms, great services and lowcost prices. There's a 24/7 bar and a half board option on request (with menu for vegans and celiacs too). (more info)

Free nights in Venice!

It's true! No joke, no game, no lottery - HostelsClub is giving away free nights and weekends in Venice.

Book at least 5 nights in any destination, and get a voucher for a free night accommodation for two in Venice!

Or enjoy a free weekend in Venice, as our loyal customer, by making five bookings (at least 2 nights each) with HostelsClub!

ABOUT HOSTELSCLUB.COM

Find accommodation in Naples with Hostelsclub! You can make a reservation in thousands of rooms in the best student hostels, cheap hotels and bed & breakfast, finding the best deals on the web. Book your holiday, be it a weekend or longer. We have selected the best hostels for backpackers in central Naples, as well as the most interesting parts of the city. Whether you're on a budget or you're looking for the best hostels in Naples, Italy, HostelsClub has got the ideal type of lodging for you.

content: Sign Up Now - My Club ( Login ) E-mail address Password (forgot your password?) Login Need help? Call us: +39 041 5246742 Naples hostels It takes just a couple of minutes to book a Naples hostel . Find 40 Naples hostels , reviewed by 1080 backpackers who have actually reserved them with us. To check availability now, fill in the form on the left of the page and click "search". You can also browse the city map, or directly access the booking form for each property by using its 'book' button. Show Map Users' blogs about Naples Hostels > Italy hostels > Campania hostels > Naples hostels Loading map... Naples Membership Card deals In this list you'll find a choice of exclusive discounts in Naples for all HostelsClub Membership Card holders. Click here to see them all » Ostello Bella Napoli Category: Hostel Address: Via G. Melisurgo 4 (7th Floor, Stair B, Door 25) - Naples, Italy Starting from: 15.00 EUR (indicative price per person, per night) 10% discount for HostelsClub.com Membership Card holders (2 nights minimum) 10% discount for 10 or more guests Bella Napoli is a youth hostel ideally located between "Università" and "Municipio" metro stops. An amazing place to stay where you'll find both private and shared rooms, great services and lowcost prices. There's a 24/7 bar and a half board option on request (with menu for vegans and celiacs too). ( more info ) high availability Customer rating (3 Reviews) 66% Hotel Europeo Category: Hotel * Address: Via Mezzocannone, 109/c - Naples, Italy Starting from: 21.24 EUR (indicative price per person, per night) 10% discount for HostelsClub.com Membership Card holders (2 nights minimum) Hotel Europeo is a cheap hotel in the center of Naples, close to museums, churches and shopping areas. The famous traditional borough of Spaccanapoli is in the vicinity, as are the main public transport lines. ( more info ) high availability Customer rating (18 Reviews) 86% Hotel Casanova Category: Hotel ** Address: Corso Garibaldi333 & Via Venezia2 - Naples, Italy Starting from: 19.95 EUR (indicative price per person, per night) 5% discount for HostelsClub.com Membership Card holders The hotel Casanova meets the needs of young people who wish to visit Italy on a small budget. You will enjoy your stay in a comfortable and friendly atmosphere!! A great choice in a place with different type of accommodations. ( more info ) high availability Customer rating (2 Reviews) 98% La Controra Hostel Naples Category: Hostel Address: Piazzetta Trinità alla Cesarea, 231 - Naples, Italy Starting from: 14.88 EUR (indicative price per person, per night) La Controra is a luxury design Hostel in Naples, in front of the National Museum. The room decor is funky, the atmosphere is laid back and relax, the noise of the city of Naples stays outside! ( more info ) high availability Customer rating (84 Reviews) 90% Fabric Hostel and Club Category: Hostel Address: Via Bellucci Sessa 22 - Naples, Italy Starting from: 15.18 EUR (indicative price per person, per night) Fabric Hostel Naples is in Portici, in a great location for exploring the city, Pompei and Ercolano. As you can guess from the name, this hostel is born from the conversion of a building of the end '800 which was a textile factory. From this conversion is born a very special hostel, restaurant&club. ( more info ) high availability Customer rating (140 Reviews) 88% Hotel Bella Capri Category: Hotel * Address: Via Melisurgo 4 (6th Floor, Stair B) - Naples, Italy Starting from: 15.33 EUR (indicative price per person, per night) 5% discount for HostelsClub.com Membership Card holders 5% discount for 40 or more guests (4 nights minimum) The Hotel in Naples with best position, right on the waterfront, in the centre of Naples with great view. Friendly, clean and safe environment.
